code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"../App.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DefaultList=()=>{const[movies,setMovies]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{getMovies();},[]);async function getMovies(){try{const response=await fetch("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie?api_key=f43ec82a5f24fe6190891894b7436c7a",{headers:{"Content-type":"application/json"},method:"GET"});if(response.ok){const data=await response.json();setMovies(data.results);}else{console.error("Failed to fetch movies.");}}catch(error){console.error("An error occurred while fetching movies:",error);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"MovieList",children:movies.map(movie=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500".concat(movie.poster_path),alt:movie.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"movie-title",children:movie.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"movie-overview",children:["Plot : ",movie.overview]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"movie-release-date",children:["Release Date: ",movie.release_date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"movie-rating",children:["Rating: ",movie.vote_average]})]})]},movie.id);})});};export default DefaultList;
